item.description: Although Netflix’s new series, ‘The Pentaverate,’ seems to be its own series, it has a connection to the film ‘So I Married an Axe Murderer.’ Source: NetflixWe’re almost halfway through 2022, but there’s still no shortage of new content arriving on streaming services. Netflix brings us another absurd comedy, The Pentaverate, this May. But as it turns out, The Pentaverate isn’t totally original — it actually has a very direct connection to a 1993 cult comedy film called So I Married an Axe Murderer.

item.title: Princeton University Student Misrach Ewunetie's Death Has Left Her Family Searching for Answers
item.description: Princeton University's Misrach Ewunetie has died. Since little to no details about her passing has been revealed, her family wants answers. Source: Twitter/@thelastshowIt’s with a heavy heart that we share the news of Princeton University student Misrach Ewunetie’s passing. Misrach, a 20-year-old Ethiopian student and junior in the Department of Sociology, had her death announced on October 24, 2022, via her family’s GoFundMe page. As students and parents have shared their concern and outrage over Misrach’s passing, interest in the nearly two-month mystery continues to heighten.

item.title: Selenis Leyva - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Orange Is the New Black star in the role of Gloria Mendoza who had a recurring role as Detective Mariluz Rivera in Law & Order. She is also known for being part of a variety of TV series, including "Gordita Chronicles" and "Lopez vs. Lopez". Before Fame She made her professional acting debut in 1999 in a different role for the series Law & Order and also appeared in an episode of Law & Order: Special Victims Unit that same year.

item.title: Sire Jackson - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Son to legendary rap sensation 50 Cent. His mother, Daphne Joy, is also a renowned model and actress. He has over 80,000 followers on Instagram.  Before Fame His parents began dating in 2011. Trivia A young model, he was a toddler when he landed his first gig as a brand ambassador for Kidz Safe, a headphone company. Family Life He has an older half brother named Marquise Jackson and an older half sister named Mia Jackson.

item.title: Tawan Kedkong - Age, Family, Bio
item.description: Thai fashion model who rose to fame after appearing as a contestant on, and winning, the fourth season of the televised talent show competition Asia's Next Top Model.  Before Fame Her career in modeling began in 2016 when she signed with Storm Model Management in London. Trivia She became a brand ambassador for Subaru in 2016. Family Life She is originally from Thailand. Associated With She and Patricia Gunawan both competed on the fourth season of Asia's Next Top Model.

item.title: The Ending of 'Kaleidoscope' Reveals the Bonds Were Taken by Someone Unexpected
item.description: Netlfix's 'Kaleidoscope' details an elaborate heist, but it's left some people wondering who actually made off with the bonds in the end. Source: NetflixSpoiler alert: This article contains MAJOR spoilers for Netflix's Kaleidoscope. Netflix's new heist series Kaleidoscope is designed to be watched in a variety of different orders, but that has left some confused about what actually happens at the end of its non-linear story. The series follows Ray Vernon, an expert thief who brings together an all-star crew to pull off the theft of billions of dollars of unmarked bearer bonds.

item.title: What Is Paul Hollywood's Net Worth? Let's Get Into It
item.description: Let's take a peek at Paul Hollywood's net worth. The celebrity chef has been cooking up projects for quite some time. At this point in Paul Hollywood's grand career, his time as a chef is often not the first thing that comes to mind. Clearly his tenure as a judge on The Great British Bake Off springs to mind, immediately followed by those steely blue eyes. Regardless of how you found Paul Hollywood, he's been in the zeitgeist for nearly two decades.

item.title: Woman Accidentally Zeroes out Entire Store Inventory at Job
item.description: "I Knew Immediately Something Wasn't Right" — Woman Accidentally Deletes Entire Store InventoryWe've all made mistakes at work, but (hopefully) none this bad. By Allison HuntUpdated April 16 2024, 4:53 p.m. ET Source: TikTok/@2beach4surfTikTok is here for the good: cute dog videos, inspirational quotes, tarot readings. TikTok is also here for the bad. We don't mean bad content necessarily, but like people sharing their bad experiences. While some of them are incredibly sad, others can just make us feel a bit better about ourselves .
